mapper.select: select * from (select a.*, rowNum rn from (select * from announcement) a) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

insert into announcement(ann_num, com_num, ann_job, ann_type, ann_career, ann_recruit_period, ann_location, ann_title, ann_view, ann_min, ann_max, ann_contents, ann_qualification, ann_prime ) values(#{ann_num}, #{com_num}, #{ann_job}, #{ann_type}, #{ann_career}, #{ann_recruit_period}, #{ann_location}, #{ann_title}, 0, #{ann_min}, #{ann_max}, #{ann_contents}, #{ann_qualification}, #{ann_prime})
